channel.title: Project Based on Delta
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Skillz- Pk[/size][/center]
Looking for a team to make this Delta server very successful, I know it's Delta but there are some out there that are famous and always have 40+ Players.
What I need is: Server Admin (1 Spot) Moderators (around 2) admin + mods must be active! Web developer - need a website Not looking for coder at this moment.
To apply you must be: 16 years of age or above. Have Experience( show with evidence)
Application form: Tbh a good one you should know what im looking for, please include enough information and any other things.
NOTE: THIS SERVER IS STILL BEING DEVELOPED SO IT'S ONLY LIKE 60% FINISHED. So far I have: Economy Based - About 80% Just need to lower drop rates. Grand Exchange - When Player Disconnects, Item goes back to Invent. GodWar Bosses Skilling Area Auto countdown donations Better combat system Great Donator items Donator Area Train Areas More Skill Areas New Barbarion assault New Godsword emotes When you kill a boss it sends a message to the player telling them the drop Webclient 100%! More to come later today.....
[size=14pt]Future Updates:[/size] Host the server More areas to train - advanced mining areas etc - will work out trust me :) Actual GodWars Maps. Depending on how successful it is - spread around all the skills. Add Dungeoneering - wont be perfect, just one of those npc kill - teleports. Need more suggestions, please leave comments
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/woodcutting.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/cooking.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/equipment-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Grandexchange.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/shops.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/backofhome.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/generalgraardor.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/teleportsmonster.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Teleports.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/zil.png[/img]
Crappy highscores- mysql used to work with me but now it has some connection errors -.-
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/highscores.png[/img]
80 mining + needed. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1005029/advanced_mining.png[/img] Credits
Me Delta Swat Moparscape google Others

item.title: Project Based on Delta
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

destroynoobz:

no no no no no no stop ruining delta mother f8cker! this is going to fail you already ahve 5 dupes you dont know about jsut because you added that shitty clan chat /facepalm

This

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:375328”]Customs - No
Items - No
Maps - No
Training Area - No
I would continue but I don’t want to sound mean. Mate, this needs a lot of improvements so I would please recommend taking the criticism given. You should remove the customs first of all, and then remove all the dead codes and fix up the server networking etc.[/quote]
That

Read full topic

item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“pokemonn, post:7, topic:375328”]I can be admin if you want also I can design a web sight if you want pm me
I’ve done this for along time plus I have over 20 people waiting fir a fresh new server that’s fun to play I can code you a forum or websight which ever[/quote]

I doubt you can code forums or a website

item.title: Project Based on Delta

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Customs - No
Items - No
Maps - No
Training Area - No
I would continue but I don’t want to sound mean. Mate, this needs a lot of improvements so I would please recommend taking the criticism given. You should remove the customs first of all, and then remove all the dead codes and fix up the server networking etc.
